member.name: M:MatrixMath.Shear2D(System.Double[0:,0:],System.Char,System.Double)
member.summary: Shears a 2D square matrix by a given factor in either X or Y direction.
member.param: The input 2D square matrix to be sheared
The shear factor to be applied
member.returns: The sheared matrix if successful, or a matrix containing -1 if: - The input matrix is not square - The direction is not 'x' or 'y'
